suggest.drupal/bibcite_migrate: Migrate your bibliographic data from the Bibliography (biblio) module
suggest.drupal/bibcite_pubmed: Provides PubMed import and lookup functionality
suggest.drupal/bibcite_altmetric: Adds Altmetric badges to BibCite reference entities
suggest.drupal/metatag_google_scholar: Provides number of meta tags to help with indexing of scholarly content/articles in Google Scholar
